com.geekabyte.jprowork

Class Prowork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geekabyte.jprowork.Prowork

  • public class Prowork
extends java.lang.Object
    Prowork main class that controls and manages representing Prowork API.

      • login

        public Member login(java.lang.String email,
           java.lang.String password)
             throws JproworkRuntimeException
        This logs in a user to Prowork Doc. http://dev.prowork.me/accounts-login
        Parameters:
        email - {String} email of the user
        password - {String} password of the user
        Returns:
        A Prowork user represented as member object
        Throws:
        InvalidLoginDetails
        MissingParameterException
        JproworkRuntimeException
        See Also:
        Member

      • subscribeToStream

        public java.lang.Boolean subscribeToStream(Member member,
                                  java.lang.String url,
                                  java.lang.String verifier)
                                    throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Subscribe to activity stream of all projects the authenticated user is a member of via push. Prowork posts the notification messages for the user to the subscribed URL http://dev.prowork.me/push-subscribe.
        Parameters:
        member - {Member} Logged in user as Member object
        url - {String} URL notification messages will be sent to (via POST).
        verifier - {String} known to you for verifying message is from Prowork. Prowork sends this with messages. On [url] page, if stored verifier string is not the same as received via post, post message is not from Prowork, ignore.
        Returns:
        Boolean. True on success, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException

      • unsubscribeToStream

        public java.lang.Boolean unsubscribeToStream(Member member)
                                      throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Un-subscribe from push activity stream. http://dev.prowork.me/push-unsubscribe.
        Returns:
        Boolean. True on success, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException

      • doAPIGet

        public java.lang.String doAPIGet(java.lang.String endpoint,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                          throws JproworkRuntimeException
        Allows making a direct GET call to Prowork API.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The URL of the end point as string
        params - A Map containing the parameter for the API endpoint you calling
        Returns:
        Json string.
        Throws:
        JproworkRuntimeException
